children.heading: Usage
children.text: Note, we tested the code on a NVIDIA V100 32GB GPU. On different GPUs, results might slightly differ.

children.heading: Setup
children.text:
Download RCC counting network weights
counting.ckpt
to weights/counting.ckpt
Run
conda env create --name ldm_count --file=env.yml
pip install timm==0.9.2
conda activate ldm_count
wget https://huggingface.co/ShilongLiu/GroundingDINO/resolve/main/groundingdino_swint_ogc.pth -P weights

children.heading: Generate one image with counting guidance
children.text:
python generate.py \
    --prompt "six apples on the table" \
    --counting_words apples \
    --counting_word_counts 6 \
    --counting_scale 1.0 \
    --seed 0 \
    --output output.png

children.heading: Reproduce paper results
children.text:
# Check exp/ for outputs
sh run_metrics.sh
